text: Ŵanganyao ni aŵala ŵaŵapele Allah chindimba, mwa achimitume, mu ŵanache ŵa Adam, ni mu aŵala ŵatwajigele pamo ni Nuhu (m’chombo), ni mu ŵanache ŵa Ibrahima ni Israila, ni mu aŵala ŵatwajongwele ni kwasagula. Pati gachisoomedwaga kukwao ma Ȃya ga (Allah) Jwaukoto wejinji, akasasenjelemukukaga kusujudu aku anankulila
